subject: Delivery to Poland
description_text:
Hello!
I'd like to purchase some of your products (Simsonn Plus X + additional
items), but Poland isn't listed as a delivery destination.
Is this correct?

--
Artsiom Kuis

conversations.body_text: Hi Artsiom Kuis,  Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland.   https://fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product%20brand=Simsonn
